dropzone.instructions: Drag and drop your image here, or press and select one instead. Max size 5MB.
dropzone.uploadNote: This action might take a few minutes depending on file size and your internet connection. Please be patient.

content.paragraph: Please use the button below to change your email address.

changeEmail.preheader: A change email request has been made.
changeEmail.subject: Change email address

content.paragraph: Please use the button below to confirm you want to sign in to {{appName}}.

magic.preheader: Confirm that you want to sign in to {{appName}}.

error.dataMissing: Translation data missing. Please try again.
error.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

login.heading: Log in
login.message: Enter an email address where we can send you a magic link ðŸª„
login.successNote: Please open the link in the email on the device that you used to log in.

errors.emptyQuantity: This field is required if a unit is selected
errors.invalidQuantity: Invalid input. Only accepts decimal numeral or fractions (e.g. 0.5, 1, 1/2).
errors.temperature: If the temperature field is filled you also need to choose a temperature scale.
errors.temperatureScale: If a temperature scale is chosen you also need to fill the temperature field.
errors.unit: You can't use this unit if the quantity field is filled.
errors.dimensionMissing: Field is required when a unit has been selected.
errors.dimensionUnitMissing: Unit is required when dimensions are entered.
errors.volumeMissing: Volume is required when a unit has been selected.
errors.volumeUnitMissing: Unit is required when volume is entered.
errors.subRecipesRequired: Sub recipe is required when an action has been selected
errors.subRecipeActionRequired: Action is required when a sub recipe has been selected

photo.content: This photo will be permanently deleted.
photo.title: Delete photo

ingredient.content: This ingredient will be permanently deleted.
ingredient.contentWithName: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? $t(recipe.modal.delete.ingredient.content)
ingredient.title: Delete ingredient

recipe.content: This recipe will be permanently deleted.
recipe.contentWithName: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? $t(recipe.modal.delete.recipe.content)
recipe.title: Delete recipe

step.content: This step will be permanently deleted.
step.contentWithName: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? $t(recipe.modal.delete.step.content)
step.title: Delete step

subRecipe.content: This sub recipe will be permanently deleted.
subRecipe.contentWithName: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? $t(recipe.modal.delete.subRecipe.content)
subRecipe.title: Delete sub recipe

equipment.content: This equipment item will be permanently deleted.
equipment.contentWithName: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? $t(recipe.modal.delete.equipment.content)
equipment.title: Delete equipment item

note.translationMessage: You can translate the recipe after it's created.

errors.emailExists: Email already exists. Please try with a different email.
errors.firstNameRequired: If you've entered last name, you should also enter your first name. Otherwise you can use the username field.
errors.invalidName: Names can contain either only cyrillic or only latin characters. Dashes (-) are allowed.
errors.invalidUsername: Username can only contain latin characters, dashes (-), dots (.) and low dashes (_).
errors.lastNameRequired: If you've entered first name, you should also enter your last name. Otherwise you can use the username field.
errors.nameRequired: Please enter either first name/last name or username.
errors.onlyUsername: If you've entered a username, both first/last name fields should be empty.
errors.usernameExists: Username already exists. Please try with a different username.

delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Everything related to it will be permanently deleted.
delete.title: Delete account

note.EMAIL_UPDATED: Your email address has been successfully updated.
note.TOKEN_EXPIRED: Change email token expired. Please try again.
note.TOKEN_NOT_FOUND: Change email token not found. Please try again.
note.USER_NOT_UPDATED: User update failed. Please try again.
note.VERIFY_ADDRESS: Please confirm the change by following the link inside the email sent to your new address.
note.USER_NAMES: Please consider updating your first and last names or username. Until then, we'll use your email address as a username.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to {{appName}}! Embark on a gastronomic adventure with our recipe app and discover the boundless joys of cooking.

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.description: Explore our extensive collection of recipes, featuring customizable servings, unit conversions, detailed ingredients, step-by-step instructions, and essential equipment.

401.title: Looks like you're not authorized to be here.

403.title: Looks like you don't have access.

500.title: Whoops! Looks like someone set the timer wrong.
